videoSnippet.title: Your Sunday is Improved! || Robson vs Xiong || U.S. Championship (2021)
videoSnippet.description:

Photos by Lennart Ootes!

Robson, Ray (2669) - Xiong, Jeffery (2700) 1-0
U.S. Championship (chess24.com) [4] 2021.10.09
B30 Sicilian, Nimzovich-Rossolimo attack (without ...d6)

1.e4 c5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Bb5 e5 4.O-O Bd6 5.c3 a6 6.Ba4 b5 7.Bc2 Nge7 8.a4 b4 9.Re1 Ng6 10.d4 bxc3 11.dxe5 cxb2 12.Bxb2 Bxe5 13.Nxe5 Ngxe5 14.Bxe5 Nxe5 15.Qd5 Nc6 16.Qxc5 Qe7 17.Qxe7+ Kxe7 18.Nc3 Nb4 19.Nd5+ Nxd5 20.exd5+ Kd8 21.d6 a5 22.Bd3 Rb8 23.Rab1 Rb7 24.Rec1 Rb4 25.Rxb4 axb4 26.a5 Bb7 27.a6 Ba8 28.a7

The 2021 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:26 Game Starts!
02:00 Completely New Game!
08:00 Pause The Video!
09:00 It Was In This Position
10:50 Contributions
